version_description:
We're so excited to celebrate YOU with something brand new...
Introducing the Investor Certificate! Commemorate your investor status and share your personalized certificate with friends. Because we might make it easy to start investing, but it's a big deal to take such an important step! Maybe you can help friends take it, too. The Investor Certificate will roll out to all of you over the next week.

We also fixed some bugs to make Acorns better for you. Small change adds up!
Thanks for growing with us.

We're so excited to celebrate YOU with something brand new...
Introducing the Investor Certificate!
Commemorate your investor status and share your personalized certificate with friends. Because we might make it easy to start investing, but it's a big deal to take such an important step! Maybe you can help friends take it, too. The Investor Certificate will roll out to all of you over the next week.

We also fixed some bugs to make Acorns better for you. Small change adds up!
Thanks for growing with us.

We're so excited to celebrate YOU with something brand new...
Introducing the Investor Certificate!
Commemorate your investor status and share your personalized certificate with friends. Because we might make it easy to start investing, but it's a big deal to take such an important step! Maybe you can help friends take it, too. The Investor Certificate will roll out to all of you over the next week.

We also fixed some bugs to make Acorns better for you. Small change adds up!
Thanks for growing with us.

Acorns Later customers, you can now allocate One-Time Contributions to the 2018 or 2019 tax years! Just tap "Invest for your future," then "Later," and select the "One-Time" button at the top of your screen.

We’ve also made some enhancements and fixed a few bugs to make Acorns even better for you, because we believe small change adds up. Grow your oak!
We're working hard in the background on some exciting upcoming features. In the meantime, we've fixed some bugs and built a few enhancements to make Acorns better for you.
We're busy building Acorns Later — the easiest way to save for retirement! We've also fixed some bugs and made enhancements to make Acorns better for you, because small change matters.

We're building Acorns Later — the easiest way to save for retirement! We've also made enhancements to make Acorns better for you, because small change matters.
Small change makes us all better, so in this update, we fixed some bugs and made small enhancements. We hope they make Acorns better for you.

Acorns Later is here! The easiest way to save for retirement is now right inside your Acorns app!

- Setup takes under 5 minutes, and there’s no initial investment required
- We’ll pick the IRA plan that’s right for you — Roth, SEP or Traditional
- Set an automatic Recurring Contribution — even $5 daily, weekly or monthly
- Make automatic One-Time Contributions any time, from anywhere

IRA stands for Individual Retirement Account, and IRAs have all kinds of tax advantages. With Acorns Later, it doesn’t matter what you make, how much you know, or how little time you have - we’ll find the IRA that’s right for you, and make it easy to save for later. From acorns mighty oaks do grow. Grow your oak!
Small change makes us all better, so in this update we fixed some bugs and made small enhancements. we hope they make Acorns better for you.

Acorns Later is here! The easiest way to save for retirement is right in your Acorns app, with a few enhancements and fixes to make it even better for you.

- We'll pick the IRA plan that's right for you — Roth, SEP or Traditional
- Set an automatic Recurring Contribution — even $5 daily, weekly or monthly
- Make automatic One-Time Contributions any time, from anywhere

Small change makes us all better, so in this update we fixed some bugs and made small enhancements. We hope they make Acorns better for you.

Pre-order Acorns Spend now! The only checking account with a debit card that saves, invests and earns for you. Only 100,000 available!

- Instantly save and invest with Real-Time Round-Ups, retirement savings and Spend Strategies
- Up to 10% invested in you from local places you visit every day
- All-digital banking, direct deposit, check sending and more
- No limited balance or overdraft fees and free unlimited access to nationwide ATMs
- Acorns + Acorns Later built in

Grow your oak!

100K debit cards sold out in 4 days! We’re ordering more. Pre-order Acorns Spend, the only debit card that saves and invests for you, made of tungsten — one of the rarest, heaviest elements on earth.

- All-digital banking, direct deposit and more
- Real-Time Round-Ups and Spend Strategies
- Up to 10% invested in you from places you visit every day
- No limited balance or overdraft fees and unlimited free or fee-reimbursed ATMs nationwide
- Investment and retirement accounts built in

To add more ways to help you grow, we’re growing our app!
- Your new Present screen features each Acorns product so it’s easy to get around.
- Tap ‘Invest for your future’ to access your investment features.
- Your core investment account has a new name, Acorns Core.
- Find Performance right on your Core, Later or Present screens.
- Pre-order Acorns Spend — the only checking account with a debit card that saves and invests for you.
Update your Acorns app for more. Thank you for growing with us!

To help you grow, we’re growing our app!
- Your Present screen now features all of our products.
- Tap “Invest for your future” for your investment accounts.
- Your core investment account has a name — Acorns Core. Find performance, withdrawals, and investment features from Core.
- We added a Round-Ups Summary card to your Core screen. If you use Manual Round-Ups, make them right from your Present or Core screens.
- View your Round-Ups history in one tap from the Past screen.
Grow your oak!

Thanks to your feedback, we’ve made some updates:
- Quick actions are now at the top of your Core and Later screens so you can easily make One-Time Investments and withdrawals.
- The $5 Round-Ups Tracker is here! Just scroll down your Core screen. You can find your Round-Ups summary card there, too.
- If you use Manual Round-Ups, make them right from your Present or Core screens.
- View your individual Round-Ups transactions in one tap.
Look out for more updates as we listen, learn, and grow with you!

Your Round-Ups should work best for you and your goals, so we’re giving them a tweak. With just a few taps, you can now see all your transactions and how you’re investing them into your future. And if you want, you can even pick which Round-Ups to invest. Hope this helps you grow your oak!

We’re rolling the feature out in stages so, if you don’t see the new feature right away, just give it a day or two and it should show up.

If you run into any issues, please contact the Acorns Support team.

We always want to make it as easy as possible for you to know where your money is and what it’s doing. So this release, we moved Acorns Later onto your Present screen under the tagline, “Later starts today.” Just tap there to learn more about the easiest way to save for retirement.

We also made some iOS stickers! They’re fun animated gifs and emojis that you can share via text message from your iPhone.
We've made some enhancements and fixed a few bugs to make Acorns even better for you, because we believe small change adds up. Grow your oak!
At Acorns, we love nature and bugs are a part of nature. But not in our app. So this release, we tracked some down and removed them.
We spotted a bug. Tracked it down. Captured it. And gently released it back into the wild far away from our app.
We surrounded the app with dirt, watered it, gave it sunlight and stood back to watch it grow. Then our boss got mad at us for ruining a phone, so we went back to work and fixed a few bugs.
We've made some enhancements and fixed a few bugs to make Acorns even better for you, because we believe small change adds up. Grow your oak!
At Acorns, we love nature and bugs are a part of nature. But not in our app. So this release, we tracked some down and removed them.
This release, our engineers had a long conversation with a few bugs. We agreed that it’s not a good fit and have decided to part ways. We wish them nothing but the best.

Acorns Early is here! In under 3 minutes, open an investment account for the kids in your life - multiple kids included!
- Set an easy Recurring Investment, starting at $5
- Get financial literacy content for families and exclusive Found Money offers
- Interact with our new Potential graph
- See possible tax savings while you help a child grow
- Unlock our financial wellness system for your family
All for just $5/month!

From acorns mighty oaks do grow. Grow their oaks!

2 updates to help you grow your oak!

1. Acorns Spend customers, find 55,000+ fee-free ATMs nationwide, around the world, and in popular stores from Target to CVS and Walgreens. Tap "ATM Locator" from your Spend screen and use your Spend card the next time you need cash.

2. Check out your new Potential graph. Tap the icon at the top of your Home screen, or view Potential right on your Early screen. Now it’s even easier to see what your investments can become.

2. Check out your new Potential graph. Tap the icon at the top of your Home screen, or view Potential right on your Early screen. Now it’s even easier to see what your investments can become.

Acorns Early, our new product to invest for your kids, with more than 50,000 kids already, proudly now supports active military families serving outside of the U.S. Thank you for your service. We hope this helps you and your families grow your oak!

- Invest for your kids’ future
- Investment, retirement, and checking accounts for you
- Earn more money and grow your knowledge
- Heavy-metal debit card with no hidden fees and 55,000+ fee-free ATMs

- Investment, retirement, and checking accounts for you
- Earn more money and grow your knowledge
- Heavy-metal debit card with no hidden fees and 55,000+ fee-free ATMs

Introducing "How to Grow" cards, customized to help you grow your money, and take the right next steps. Look for personalized tips, actions, offers, education and more on your home screen. We hope this helps you grow your oak!

Check out our new Spend tour and learn about all the benefits included:

- Automatically invests the round ups from all of your purchases
- No overdraft or minimum-balance fees
- Automatically invest a percentage of every paycheck
- Over 55,000 fee-free ATMs
- Up to 10% bonus investments when you use your card
- Plus, a retirement account

Now you can invest in yourself and the planet with Acorns Sustainable Portfolios, expertly designed and ESG-vetted to help grow your oak! Each portfolio is made up of different ETFs, that score highly on environmental, social, and governance factors (ESG) helping to make a positive impact on the planet, the people, and the animals.
